# AnimatLabs

> A .NET engineering blog by Animesh Agarwal (Principal Software Engineer at Autodesk). Covers C#, .NET architecture, performance optimization, DevOps, AI integration, and open-source library development.

## About

AnimatLabs is a technical blog focused on practical .NET development, software architecture patterns, and developer productivity. The author maintains WorkflowForge, an open-source .NET workflow orchestration library.

- Author: Animesh Agarwal
- Site: https://animatlabs.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/animat089
- WorkflowForge: https://github.com/animatlabs/workflow-forge

## Content Structure

This site consists of two main sections:

1. **Blog** (https://animatlabs.com/): Technical articles, tutorials, and insights
2. **WorkflowForge Documentation** (https://animatlabs.com/workflow-forge/): Product documentation, API reference, architecture guides

Both sections are allowed for AI/LLM indexing and training. The WorkflowForge section has its own detailed llms.txt at https://animatlabs.com/workflow-forge/llms.txt

## Topics Covered

- .NET / C# development (performance, patterns, new features)
- Software architecture (Clean Architecture, Modular Monolith, Vertical Slice, Event Sourcing)
- DevOps and infrastructure (Docker, Traefik, Podman, CI/CD)
- AI/ML with .NET (Semantic Kernel, Ollama, Microsoft.Extensions.AI)
- Real-time data pipelines (CDC, Debezium, Kafka, SignalR)
- Open-source library reviews and comparisons
- Developer experience and productivity

## Key Posts

- [WorkflowForge Introduction](https://animatlabs.com/technical/.net/.net-core/workflow-forge-introduction/): Building a .NET workflow orchestration library
- [WorkflowForge 2.0 Performance](https://animatlabs.com/technical/.net/.net-core/workflow-forge-2-performance-unleashed/): Performance improvements and benchmarks
- [EF Core Performance](https://animatlabs.com/technical/.net/.net-core/ef-core-performance/): Entity Framework Core optimization techniques
- [Clean Architecture](https://animatlabs.com/technical/.net/.net-core/clean-architecture/): Implementing Clean Architecture in .NET
- [Mapping Performance](https://animatlabs.com/technical/.net/.net-core/mapping-performance/): Object mapping benchmarks in .NET
- [Security in .NET](https://animatlabs.com/technical/.net/.net-core/security-dotnet/): Security best practices for .NET applications

- https://animatlabs.com/feed.xml
